charges.charge_description: 21 USC 846 CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE AND DISTRIBUTE A CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE(1ss)

charges.charge_disposition: LIFE imprisonment, 10 years supervised release with standard and special conditions, $200 special assessment, remanded to the United States Marshal..1/17/2017 - Executive Grant of Clemency from President Barack Obama as to Alberto Chahia to commute the total sentence of imprisonment to a term of 188 months, leaving intact and in effect the 10-year term of supervised release with all its conditions and all other components of the sentence. I also direct the Bureau of Prisons to make available the Residential Drug Abuse Program (RDAP), or future equivalent program, at an appropriate time before the sentence expires. Further, I condition the grant of commutation on that person enrolling in the RDAP program by written agreement, as evidenced by the person signing, within 14 days of receipt of a certified copy of this document, a receipt verifying his acceptance of the commutation granted with all of its conditions, including enrollment in RDAP.

charges.charge_description: 21 USC 841(a)(1) and 18 USC 2  POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE A CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE(11ss)

charges.charge_disposition: LIFE imprisonment, 10 years supervised release with standard and special conditions, $200 special assessment, remanded to the United States Marshal. 1/17/2017 - Executive Grant of Clemency from President Barack Obama as to Alberto Chahia to commute the total sentence of imprisonment to a term of 188 months, leaving intact and in effect the 10-year term of supervised release with all its conditions and all other components of the sentence. I also direct the Bureau of Prisons to make available the Residential Drug Abuse Program (RDAP), or future equivalent program, at an appropriate time before the sentence expires. Further, I condition the grant of commutation on that person enrolling in the RDAP program by written agreement, as evidenced by the person signing, within 14 days of receipt of a certified copy of this document, a receipt verifying his acceptance of the commutation granted with all of its conditions, including enrollment in RDAP.
